name: require-chain
description: Functions that retrieve all the dependency or the dependent files that related to the target file.

scripts.build: tsc --module commonjs --target es2015 --sourceMap true --declaration true index.ts
scripts.postpublish: ls index.* | grep -v index.ts | xargs rm -f
scripts.posttest: ls test/*js* | xargs rm -f && ls index.js* | xargs rm -f
